episodes.original_body:
Case: Deanna-Jones-MVA-7-30-2025
Client: Deanna Jones

**COMPREHENSIVE FILE ORGANIZATION COMPLETED - 100% SUCCESS**

Completed full Case File Organization skill workflow using 8-bucket system with perfect accuracy (0% error rate).

**WORKFLOW PHASES:**
- Phase 1 (Inventory): Generated inventory of 19 files with filename scrambling (7.19s)
- Phase 2 (Analysis & Mapping): Single sub-agent mapped all files with proper categorization (~2 min)
- Phase 2 Validation: Verified 19 file rows, no placeholders (0.84s)
- Phase 3 (Quality Review): 0.0% error rate - APPROVED FOR EXECUTION (~1 min)
- Phase 4 (Execution): 19 operations executed (8 moves + 11 deletes) (4.58s)
- Phase 5 (Verification): 100% success confirmation (~1 min)

**RESULTS:**
- Files organized: 16 total (8 PDFs + 8 .md companions)
- Files moved: Investigation (2), Medical Records (2), Insurance (10), Lien (2)
- Duplicates deleted: 11 files
- Naming compliance: 100% (16/16 files)
- PDF+MD pairing: 100% (8/8 pairs)
- Quality metrics: 100% accuracy across all phases

**CASE DETAILS EXTRACTED:**

**Accident:** 7/30/2025 at 16:30, W Ashland Ave at KY1865-Taylor Blvd, Louisville (angle collision at stop & go signal). Police Report: LMPD Master File #73213777.

**Parties:** Client: Deanna Jones (DOB 7/19/1979), 2006 Ford Econoline E350, Plate BGR740. At-Fault: Leiby Sanchez Luis, 2013 Mercedes-Benz, Plate C4H164, VIN JGDF7CE1DA111071.

**Insurance:** Clearcover Insurance, Claim #25ATKY467651324. LOR sent 9/16/2025 by Aaron G. Whaley, Esq. At-fault policy: KY160915 (effective 3/30/2025 - 9/30/2025).

**Injuries:** Low back pain with MRI findings (8/19/2025 at 1st Diagnostics): L5-S1 broad-based 3mm disc herniation, L4-L5 broad-based 3mm disc herniation with central canal stenosis, L3-L4 diffuse 2mm disc bulge. Radiologist: Philip McDonald, MD.

**Medical Providers:** Richard McPherson, D.C. (referring chiropractor), 1st Diagnostics (MRI), A Plus Chiropractic, Primary Express Care + Wellness. Records pending from all providers except 1st Diagnostics.

**Liens:** Medicare questionnaire on file (2020), lien status to be determined.

**Timeline:** 7/30/2025 accident → 8/19/2025 MRI → 9/16/2025 LOR sent → 11/30/2025 file organization complete.

**NEXT STEPS:** (1) Follow up with Clearcover on LOR response, (2) Request complete medical records from all providers, (3) Review MRI findings with medical expert, (4) Obtain accident scene/vehicle photos, (5) Complete Medicare questionnaire.

**REPORTS GENERATED:** file_inventory, file_reorganization_map, quality_review, reorganization_plan.json, verification_report, FINAL_Deanna_Jones_File_Organization_20251130.md (all in Reports/ folder).
episodes.natural_language:
Case: Deanna-Jones-MVA-7-30-2025. Client: Deanna Jones.

The comprehensive file organization was completed with 100% success, using an 8-bucket system and achieving a perfect 0% error rate.

Workflow phases progressed as follows: Phase 1 (Inventory) generated an inventory of 19 files with filename scrambling in 7.19 seconds. Phase 2 (Analysis & Mapping) had a single sub-agent map all files with proper categorization in about 2 minutes. Phase 2 Validation verified 19 file rows with no placeholders in 0.84 seconds. Phase 3 (Quality Review) produced a 0.0% error rate and approval for execution, taking roughly 1 minute. Phase 4 (Execution) involved 19 operations (8 moves and 11 deletes) completed in 4.58 seconds. Phase 5 (Verification) yielded a 100% success confirmation in about 1 minute.

Results: A total of 16 files were organized (8 PDFs and 8 accompanying .md files). Files were moved to 4 categories: Investigation (2), Medical Records (2), Insurance (10), and Lien (2). Duplicates were deleted—11 files in total. Naming compliance was 100% (16 of 16 files). PDF+MD pairing was 100% (8 of 8 pairs). Quality metrics were 100% accuracy across all phases.

Case details extracted: The accident occurred on July 30, 2025 at 16:30 at the intersection of W Ashland Ave and KY1865-Taylor Blvd in Louisville, described as an angle collision at a stop-and-go signal. The Police Report is LMPD Master File #73213777. Parties involved: the client, Deanna Jones (DOB July 19, 1979), was driving a 2006 Ford Econoline E350 with plate BGR740. At fault was Leiby Sanchez Luis, who drove a 2013 Mercedes-Benz with plate C4H164 and VIN JGDF7CE1DA111071. The at-fault insurer is Clearcover Insurance, Claim #25ATKY467651324. A Letter of Representation was sent on September 16, 2025 by Aaron G. Whaley, Esq. The at-fault policy is KY160915, effective March 30, 2025 through September 30, 2025.

Injuries include low back pain with MRI findings dated August 19, 2025 at 1st Diagnostics: L5-S1 broad-based 3 mm disc herniation, L4-L5 broad-based 3 mm disc herniation with central canal stenosis, and L3-L4 diffuse 2 mm disc bulge. The radiologist was Philip McDonald, MD. Medical providers involved include Richard McPherson, D.C. (referring chiropractor), 1st Diagnostics (MRI), A Plus Chiropractic, and Primary Express Care + Wellness. Records are pending from all providers except 1st Diagnostics.

Liens: A Medicare questionnaire is on file from 2020; lien status remains to be determined.

Timeline: The sequence is as follows—7/30/2025 accident, 8/19/2025 MRI, 9/16/2025 Letter of Representation sent, and 11/30/2025 file organization complete.

Next steps: (1) Follow up with Clearcover on the LOR response, (2) Request complete medical records from all providers, (3) Review MRI findings with a medical expert, (4) Obtain accident scene and vehicle photos, (5) Complete the Medicare questionnaire.

Reports Generated: The following reports were created and stored in the Reports/ folder: file_inventory, file_reorganization_map, quality_review, reorganization_plan.json, verification_report, and FINAL_Deanna_Jones_File_Organization_20251130.md.
episodes.author: Roscoe (AI Paralegal)
